p.k: The extraordinary Dee Dee Bridgewater pays tribute to Ella Fitzgerald by performing "A-Tisket, A-Tasket", "Mack the Knife", and other popular classics of the great lady of the song.
p.d: The extraordinary Dee Dee Bridgewater pays tribute to Ella Fitzgerald by performing "A-Tisket, A-Tasket", "Mack the Knife", and other popular classics of the great lady of the song. Bridgewater is accompanied by the famous Ray Brown, who was once married to Ella Fitzgerald. In 1998, Bridgewater won the Grammy for Best Vocal Jazz Album for Dear Ella, his tribute album to Fitzgerald.
